00025    class Memory
00026    { 
00027    public:
00028 
00035       template <typename Data>
00036       static void allocate(Data*& ptr, size_t size);

00045       static void deallocate(Data*& ptr, size_t size);

00063    
00064    /*
00065    * Allocate a C array.
00066    */
00067    template <typename Data>
00068    void Memory::allocate(Data*& ptr, size_t size)
00069    {
00070       try {
00071          ptr  = new Data[size];
00072       } catch (std::bad_alloc&) {
00073          std::cout << "Allocation error" << std::endl;
00074          throw;
00075       }
00076       totalAllocated_ += size*sizeof(Data);
00077    }
00078 
00079    /*
00080    * De-allocate a C array.
00081    */
00082    template <typename Data>
00083    void Memory::deallocate(Data*& ptr, size_t size)
00084    {
00085       if (ptr) {
00086          delete [] ptr;
00087          totalAllocated_ -= size*sizeof(Data);
00088          ptr = 0;
00089       }
00090    }
00091 
00092 } 
00093 #endif
